meta.name: description
meta.content: The e-texts of the SARIT project. Contribute to sarit/SARIT-corpus development by creating an account on GitHub.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: The e-texts of the SARIT project. Contribute to sarit/SARIT-corpus development by creating an account on GitHub.

tr.td: <authority>SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts</authority>
<item>to Share — to copy, distribute and transmit the work</item>
<item>Attribution — You must attribute the work in the manner specified
by the author or licensor (but not in any way that suggests that
they endorse you or your use of the work).</item>
<item>Share Alike — If you alter, transform, or build upon this work,
you may distribute the resulting work only under the same or similar
More information and fuller details of this license are given on the Creative
SARIT assumes no responsibility for unauthorised use that infringes the
rights of any copyright owners, known or unknown.
<note>Aṣṭāvakragītā, transcribed by Suryansu Ray from the Lucknow 1971 edition, with
The printed edition from which this e-text was transcribed was written in the
Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using
the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (<ref
>The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration</ref>). IAST differs in
small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars.
Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following
replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṁ -> ṃ
Text division is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)
Initial vowel elision for avagraha is reversed and marked with a + sign: e.g.,
The e-text was typed by Suryamsu Ray personally from a reprint of the Lucknow
1971 edition. He notes: <quote>Only one edition I could buy myself from
Munshiram Manoharlal Publisher Private Ltd., which is in Hindi with Hindi
commentary as follows: "<bibl>Ashtavakragita", with Hindi commentary by
Raibahadur Babu Zalim Singh, edited by Dr. Brijesh Kumar Shukla,
published by Tejkumar Bookdepot P. Ltd., Lucknow, UP, India.</bibl> I
wanted to have at least one more version of the text for comparison wherever
doubts arose. Many Ashrams publish ancient texts for their own need. From a
religious mela I procured one, whose printing and exposition is less that
desirable. However, it served me the purpose of pinpointing the errors, for
which I apply mainly chhandas and usual philosophical word combinations and
<change>Conversion by OxGarage from .doc to TEI P5, and initial TEI header.
<change> Added div divisions for the chapters; moved the verse xml:id numbers to the
beginning of the ślokas instead of the beginning of the second line of the ślokas
<change>Corrected the note in notesStmt since we now know the edition on which this
e-text is based. Corrected the encodingDesc to match the known
<change who="https://viaf.org/viaf/308710472/" when="2016-05-03">Replaced p's with lg's and l's.</change>
<change who="https://viaf.org/viaf/308710472/" when="2016-05-03">Wrapped colophon in a trailer-element.</change>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.3"><l>na pṛthvī na jalaṃ nāgnirna vāyurdyaurna vā bhavān|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.4"><l>yadi dehaṃ pṛthakkṛtya citi viśrāmya tiṣṭhasi|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.5"><l>na tvaṃ viprādiko varṇo nāśramī nākṣagocaraḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.6"><l>dharmādharmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mānasāni na te bibho|</l>
<l>na kartā+asi na bhoktā+asi mukta evā+asi sarvadā||1|6||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.13"><l>ātmā sākṣī vibhuḥ pūrṇa eko muktaścidakriyaḥ| </l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_1.16"><l>tvayā vyāptamidaṃ viśvaṃ tvayi protaṃ yathārthataḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.1"><l>aho nirañjanaḥ śānto bodho+ahaṃ prakṛteḥ paraḥ|</l>
<l>tathā viśvaṃ mayi kḷptaṃ mayā vyāptaṃ nirantaram||2|6||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.8"><l>prakāśo me nijaṃ rūpaṃ nātirikto+asmyahaṃ tataḥ|</l>
<l>rūpyaṃ śuktau phaṇī rajjau vāri sūryakare yathā||2|9||</l></lg>
<l>mṛdi kumbho jale vīciḥ kanake kaṭakaṃ yathā||2|10||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.11"><l>aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ vināśo yasya nāsti me|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.13"><l>aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ dakṣo nāstīha matsamaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.14"><l>aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ yasya me nāsti kiñcana|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.15"><l>jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā jñātā tritayaṃ nāsti vāstavam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.18"><l>aho mayi sthitaṃ viśvaṃ vastuto na mayi sthitam|</l>
<l>na me bandho+asti mokṣo vā bhrāntiḥ śāntā nirāśrayā||2|18||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.21"><l>aho janasamūhe+api na dvaitaṃ paśyato mama|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_2.22"><l>nāhaṃ deho na me deho jīvo nāhamahaṃ hi cit|</l>
<l>ayameva hi me bandha āsīdyā jīvite spṛhā||2|22||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_3.3"><l>viśvaṃ sphurati yatredaṃ taraṅgā iva sāgare|</l>
<l>idaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyaṃ sa kiṃ paśyati dhīradhīḥ||3|13||</l></lg>
<l>yadvetti tatsa kurute na bhayaṃ tasya kutracit||4|6||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_5.1"><l>na te saṅgo+asti kenāpi kiṃ śuddhastyaktumicchasi|</l>
<l>iti jñānaṃ tathaitasya na tyāgo na graho layaḥ||6|1||</l></lg>
<l>iti jñānaṃ tathaitasya na tyāgo na graho layaḥ||6|2||</l></lg>
<l>iti jñānaṃ tathaitasya na tyāgo na graho layaḥ||6|3||</l></lg>
<l>iti jñānaṃ tathaitasya na tyāgo na graho layaḥ||6|4||</l></lg>
<l>udetu vāstamāyātu na me vṛddhirna ca kṣatiḥ||7|2||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_8.1"><l>tadā bandho yadā cittaṃ kiñcidvāñchati śocati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_8.2"><l>tadā muktiryadā cittaṃ na vāñchati na śocati|</l>
<l>na muñcati na gṛhṇāti na hṛṣyati na kupyati||8|2||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_8.3"><l>tadā bandho yadā cittaṃ saktaṃ kāsvapi dṛṣṭiṣu|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_8.4"><l>yadā nāhaṃ tadā mokṣo yadāhaṃ bandhanaṃ tadā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_9.1"><l>kṛtākṛte ca dvandvāni kadā śāntāni kasya vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_9.4"><l>ko+asau kālo vayaḥ kiṃ vā yatra dvandvāni no nṛṇām|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_9.5"><l>nānā mataṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sādhūnāṃ yogināṃ tathā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_9.6"><l>kṛtvā mūrtiparijñānaṃ caitanyasya na kiṃ guruḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_9.8"><l>vāsanā eva saṃsāra iti sarvā vimuñca tāḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_10.3"><l>yatra yatra bhavettṛṣṇā saṃsāraṃ viddhi tatra vai|</l>
<l>avidyāpi na kiñcitsā kā bubhutsā tathāpi te||10|5||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_10.6"><l>rājyaṃ sutāḥ kalatrāṇi śarīrāṇi sukhāni ca|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_10.8"><l>kṛtaṃ na kati janmāni kāyena manasā girā|</l>
<l>tṛptaḥ svasthendriyo nityaṃ na vāñchati na śocati||11|3||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_11.6"><l>nāhaṃ deho na me deho bodho+ahamiti niścayī|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_12.8"><l>evameva kṛtaṃ yena sa kṛtārtho bhavedasau|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_13.2"><l>kutrāpi khedaḥ kāyasya jihvā kutrāpi khidyate|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_13.3"><l>kṛtaṃ kimapi naiva syāditi saṃcintya tattvataḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_13.5"><l>arthānarthau na me sthityā gatyā na śayanena vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_13.6"><l>svapato nāsti me hāniḥ siddhiryatnavato na vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_14.2"><l>kva dhanāni kva mitrāṇi kva me viṣayadasyavaḥ|</l>
<l>kva śāstraṃ kva ca vijñānaṃ yadā me galitā spṛhā||14|2||</l></lg>
<l>nairāśye bandhamokṣe ca na cintā muktaye mama||14|3||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_15.4"><l>na tvaṃ deho na te deho bhoktā kartā na vā bhavān|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_15.7"><l>viśvaṃ sphurati yatredaṃ taraṅgā iva sāgare|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_15.8"><l>śraddhatsva tāta śraddhatsva nātra mohaṃ kuruṣva bhoḥ|</l>
<l>kva vṛddhiḥ kva ca vā hānistava cinmātrarūpiṇaḥ||15|10||</l></lg>
<l>udetu vā+astamāyātu na te vṛddhirna vā kṣatiḥ||15|11||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_15.12"><l>tāta cinmātrarūpo+asi na te bhinnamidaṃ jagat|</l>
<l>kuto janma kuto karma kuto+ahaṃkāra eva ca||15|13||</l></lg>
<l>na te bandho+asti mokṣo vā kṛtakṛtyaḥ sukhaṃ cara||15|18||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_15.20"><l>tyajaiva dhyānaṃ sarvatra mā kiñciddhṛdi dhāraya|</l>
<l>ātmā tvaṃ mukta evāsi kiṃ vimṛśya kariṣyasi||15|20||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_16.2"><l>bhogaṃ karma samādhiṃ vā kuru vijña tathāpi te|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_16.5"><l>idaṃ kṛtamidaṃ neti dvandvairmuktaṃ yadā manaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_16.8"><l>pravṛttau jāyate rāgo nivṛttau dveṣa eva hi|</l>
<l>na ca jñānī na vā yogī kevalaṃ duḥkhabhāgasau||16|10||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_16.11"><l>haro yadyupadeṣṭā te hariḥ kamalajo+api vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.3"><l>na jātu viṣayāḥ ke+api svārāmaṃ harṣayantyamī|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.7"><l>vāñchā na viśvavilaye na dveṣastasya ca sthitau|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.10"><l>na jāgarti na nidrāti nonmīlati na mīlati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.13"><l>na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na kupyati|</l>
<l>na dadāti na gṛhṇāti muktaḥ sarvatra nīrasaḥ||17|13||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.14"><l>sānurāgāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛtyuṃ vā samupasthitam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.15"><l>sukhe duḥkhe nare nāryāṃ saṃpatsu vipatsu ca|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.16"><l>na hiṃsā naiva kāruṇyaṃ nauddhatyaṃ na ca dīnatā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_17.17"><l>na mukto viṣayadveṣṭā na vā viṣayalolupaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.5"><l>na dūraṃ na ca saṃkocāllabdhamevātmanaḥ padam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.8"><l>ātmā brahmeti niścitya bhāvābhāvau ca kalpitau|</l>
<l>niṣkāmaḥ kiṃ vijānāti kiṃ brūte ca karoti kim||18|8||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.10"><l>na vikṣepo na caikāgryaṃ nātibodho na mūḍhatā|</l>
<l>na sukhaṃ na ca vā duḥkhamupaśāntasya yoginaḥ||18|10||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.11"><l>svārājye bhaikṣyavṛttau ca lābhālābhe jane vane|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.12"><l>kva dharmaḥ kva ca vā kāmaḥ kva cārthaḥ kva vivekatā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.13"><l>kṛtyaṃ kimapi naivāsti na kā+api hṛdi rañjanā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.14"><l>kva mohaḥ kva ca vā viśvaṃ kva taddhyānaṃ kva muktatā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.15"><l>yena viśvamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sa nāstīti karotu vai|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.16"><l>yena dṛṣṭaṃ paraṃ brahma so+ahaṃ brahmeti cintayet|</l>
<l>kiṃ cintayati niścinto dvitīyaṃ yo na paśyati||18|16||</l></lg>
<l>na samādhiṃ na vikṣepaṃ na lepaṃ svasya paśyati||18|18||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.20"><l>pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā naiva dhīrasya durgrahaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.22"><l>asaṃsārasya tu kvāpi na harṣo na viṣādatā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.23"><l>kutrāpi na jihāsāsti hāśā vāpi na kutracit|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.25"><l>kṛtaṃ dehena karmedaṃ na mayā śuddharūpiṇā|</l>
<l>na kalpate na jānāti na śṛṇoti na paśyati||18|27||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.29"><l>yasyāntaḥ syādahaṃkāro na karoti karoti saḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.31"><l>nirdhyātuṃ ceṣṭituṃ vāpi yaccittaṃ na pravartate|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.35"><l>śuddhaṃ buddhaṃ priyaṃ pūrṇaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirāmayam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.39"><l>na śāntiṃ labhate mūḍho yataḥ śamitumicchati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.41"><l>kva nirodho vimūḍhasya yo nirbandhaṃ karoti vai|</l>
<l>śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ vāpi tasya ceṣṭā hi bālavat||18|49||</l></lg>
<l>dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjya dhīrasya na kāpi hṛdi vāsanā||18|54||</l></lg>
<l>vihasya dhikkṛto yogī na yāti vikṛtiṃ manāk||18|55||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.56"><l>santuṣṭo+api na santuṣṭaḥ khinno+api na ca khidyate|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.57"><l>kartavyataiva saṃsāro na tāṃ paśyanti sūrayaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.59"><l>sukhamāste sukhaṃ śete sukhamāyāti yāti ca|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.65"><l>sa eva dhanya ātmajñaḥ sarvabhāveṣu yaḥ samaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.66"><l>kva saṃsāraḥ kva cābhāsaḥ kva sādhyaṃ kva ca sādhanam|</l>
<l>kva vidhiḥ kva ca vairāgyaṃ kva tyāgaḥ kva śamo+api vā||18|71||</l></lg>
<l>kva bandhaḥ kva ca vā mokṣaḥ kva harṣaḥ kva viṣādatā||18|72||</l></lg>
<l>kva vidyā kva ca vā viśvaṃ kva deho+ahaṃ mameti vā||18|74||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.76"><l>mandaḥ śrutvāpi tadvastu na jahāti vimūḍhatām|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.78"><l>kva tamaḥ kva prakāśo vā hānaṃ kva ca na kiñcana|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.79"><l>kva dhairyaṃ kva vivekitvaṃ kva nirātaṅkatā+api vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.80"><l>na svargo naiva narako jīvanmuktirna caiva hi|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.82"><l>na śāntaṃ stauti niṣkāmo na duṣṭamapi nindati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.83"><l>dhīro na dveṣṭi saṃsāramātmānaṃ na didṛkṣati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.86"><l>patatūdetu vā deho nāsya cintā mahātmanaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.90"><l>jānannapi na jānāti paśyannapi na paśyati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.91"><l>bhikṣurvā bhūpatirvāpi yo niṣkāmaḥ sa śobhate|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.92"><l>kva svācchandyaṃ kva saṃkocaḥ kva vā tattvaviniścayaḥ|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.94"><l>supto+api na suṣuptau ca svapne+api śayito na ca|</l>
<l>na sukhī na ca vā duḥkhī na virakto na saṅgavān|</l>
<l>na mumukṣurna vā mukto na kiñcinna ca kiñcana||18|96||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.97"><l>vikṣepe+api na vikṣiptaḥ samādhau na samādhimān|</l>
<l>jāḍye+api na jaḍo dhanyaḥ pāṇḍitye+api na paṇḍitaḥ||18|97||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_18.99"><l>na prīyate vandyamāno nindyamāno na kupyati|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.2"><l>kva dharmaḥ kva ca vā kāmaḥ kva cārthaḥ kva vivekatā|</l>
<l>kva dvaitaṃ kva ca vā+advaitaṃ svamahimni sthitasya me||19|2||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.3"><l>kva bhūtaṃ kva bhaviṣyadvā vartamānamapi kva vā|</l>
<l>kva deśaḥ kva ca vā nityaṃ svamahimni sthitasya me||19|3||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.4"><l>kva cātmā kva ca vā+anātmā kva śubhaṃ kvāśubhaṃ tathā|</l>
<l>kva cintā kva ca vā+acintā svamahimni sthitasya me||19|4||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.5"><l>kva svapnaḥ kva suṣuptirvā kva ca jāgaraṇaṃ tathā|</l>
<l>kva turīyaṃ bhayaṃ vā+api svamahimni sthitasya me||19|5||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.6"><l>kva dūraṃ kva samīpaṃ vā bāhyaṃ kvābhyantaraṃ kva vā|</l>
<l>kva sthūlaṃ kva ca vā sūkṣmaṃ svamahimni sthitasya me||19|6||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_19.7"><l>kva mṛtyurjīvitaṃ vā kva lokāḥ kvāsya kva laukikam|</l>
<l>kva layaḥ kva samādhirvā svamahimni sthitasya me||19|7||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.1"><l>kva bhūtāni kva deho vā kvendriyāṇi kva vā manaḥ|</l>
<l>kva śūnyaṃ kva ca nairāśyaṃ matsvarūpe nirañjane||20|1||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.2"><l>kva śāstraṃ kvātmavijñānaṃ kva vā nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ|</l>
<l>kva tṛptiḥ kva vitṛṣṇatvaṃ gatadvandvasya me sadā||20|2||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.3"><l>kva vidyā kva ca vā+avidyā kvāhaṃ kvedaṃ mama kva vā|</l>
<l>kva bandhaḥ kva ca vā mokṣaḥ svarūpasya kva rūpatā||20|3||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.4"><l>kva prārabdhāni karmāṇi jīvanmuktirapi kva vā|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.5"><l>kva kartā kva ca vā bhoktā niṣkriyaṃ sphuraṇaṃ kva vā|</l>
<l>kvāparokṣaṃ phalaṃ vā kva niḥsvabhāvasya me sadā||20|5||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.6"><l>kva lokaṃ kva mumukṣurvā kva yogī jñānavānkva vā|</l>
<l>kva baddhaḥ kva ca vā muktaḥ svasvarūpe+ahamadvaye||20|6||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.7"><l>kva sṛṣṭiḥ kva ca saṃhāraḥ kva sādhyaṃ kva ca sādhanam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.8"><l>kva pramātā pramāṇaṃ vā kva prameyaṃ kva ca pramā|</l>
<l>kva kiñcitkva na kiñcidvā sarvadā vimalasya me||20|8||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.9"><l>kva vikṣepaḥ kva caikāgryaṃ kva nirbodhaḥ kva mūḍhatā|</l>
<l>kva harṣaḥ kva viṣādo vā sarvadā niṣkriyasya me||20|9||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.10"><l>kva caiṣa vyavahāro vā kva ca sā paramārthatā|</l>
<l>kva sukhaṃ kva ca vā duḥkhaṃ nirvimarśasya me sadā||20|10||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.11"><l>kva māyā kva ca saṃsāraḥ kva prītirviratiḥ kva vā|</l>
<l>kva jīvaḥ kva ca tadbrahma sarvadā vimalasya me||20|11||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.12"><l>kva pravṛttirnivṛttirvā kva muktiḥ kva ca bandhanam|</l>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.13"><l>kvopadeśaḥ kva vā śāstraṃ kva śiṣyaḥ kva ca vā guruḥ|</l>
<l>kva cāsti puruṣārtho vā nirupādheḥ śivasya me||20|13||</l></lg>
<lg xml:id="verse_20.14"><l>kva cāsti kva ca vā nāsti kvāsti caikaṃ kva ca dvayam|</l>
